content: At 18:30 on the afternoon of June 8, a traffic accident occurred at the intersection of Renmin Road and Wangfujing Road in Nantong City. The casualties are currently unknown. A citizen posted a message online and was asked to delete it by "they".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 8, Henan. Candidates shouted to the camera, "Free Palestine, From the river to the sea, Palestine will be free"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On June 7, a man in Lu'an, Anhui Province, was arrested by local police for spreading rumors because he joked in a WeChat group that he would "take the college entrance examination for you, 16,888 per session, and guarantee retaking the exam."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
June 8 (released), Xingtai, Hebei.
It was reported online that a female student from Xingtai No. 2 Middle School was stabbed to death by a classmate on the eve of the college entrance examination (June 4 at 4 pm) and was hospitalized for emergency treatment.
Parents displayed a banner at the school gate, accusing the school of harboring the murderer, not calling the police within an hour of the incident, and not providing information about the murderer.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, many Chinese banks have introduced a repayment method of "interest first, principal later".
A manager of an Industrial Bank branch in Yuexiu District said: If the loan period is 30 years, the first 10 years can pay interest monthly, and repay 1% of the principal each year. The middle 10 years will pay interest monthly, and repay 4% of the principal each year. The last 10 years will pay interest monthly, and repay 5% of the principal each year.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, a maintenance engineer with the Douyin account "Mangedian New Energy Maintenance Technology Center" posted a video showing that Xiaopeng cars could not be charged, had a high failure rate and poor workmanship, and was issued a lawyer's letter by the charger manufacturer Xinrui asking for an apology.
So the engineer began to apologize online every day, in both Chinese and English.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 8, Xuancheng, Anhui. A man wearing Arabic clothes and holding a Palestinian flag in a shopping mall was taken away by the police.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
This year's college entrance examination Chinese language subject new curriculum standard I essay caused some controversy because it involved "artificial intelligence".
Blogger "Yuan Xi's Yuan Zhuo Hui" believes that in order to answer this question, you first need to know the underlying logic of artificial intelligence. However, some parents and teachers still use artificial intelligence as a cheating tool.
Some netizens also believe that children in mountainous areas may not understand AI, and such test questions are unfair to them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Shandong Yimeng suffered a severe drought. There has been no effective rainfall for half a year. The rivers are almost dry and the riverbeds are cracked.
The helpless old people had to kneel down and pray for rain.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Local netizens said that videos about the Yimeng drought were restricted on the Internet

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Some netizens questioned why the Yimeng drought was not on the hot search list

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The current reason for stopping student allowances circulating in the China Fire and Rescue Academy forum
In short: the government has no money

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the 35th anniversary of June 4th, we collaborated with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of June 4th special photos from the 1989 Democracy Movement scene No. 27 (June 9)
[Exclusive Picture] [Corpses in Fuxing Hospital on the day of June 4th]

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 9, Changsha, Hunan. A student at Changjun Middle School rushed out of the examination room, grabbed the reporter's microphone, and after thanking his parents and teachers, expressed his solidarity with Palestine: "There are a group of children in Palestine who are younger than us. Their country is experiencing war. I hope for world peace."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On June 7, Shenzhen Airlines flight ZH9118 flew from Beijing to Shenzhen. With the boarding door closed, two foreign passengers suddenly asked to get off the plane, causing panic among other passengers, who asked to get off the plane and undergo a new security check.
The crew said they did not want this kind of ethnic discrimination to occur. This caused dissatisfaction among passengers, who accused the crew of being pro-Western.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 9, Daqing City, Heilongjiang Province. After the college entrance examination, a candidate rushed out of the examination room wearing a Palestinian flag.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: It is reported that the current actions of candidates from all over the country to support Palestine should be a spontaneous call from netizens.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: This year, candidates from many parts of the country expressed their support for Palestine in interviews during the college entrance examination

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 9, Kunshan, Jiangsu. Candidates walked out of the examination room and showed the Palestinian flag to the public.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: June 8, Tianjin. Wuyue Plaza owed workers wages, so the workers, along with their families, sat in front of the square to demand their wages.
